title: Did Nancy Belusi admit to Democrats?
subtitle: Untrustful sources claimed that Belusi admitted in the video that Democrats used such a tactic, but in fact attributed it to the Republicans.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In the C-S-Ban video, the minority leader of the United States House, Nancy Belusi, revealed that Democrats use a political tactic to discredit what they call "clawed mutilation."
